mn129:2.4: ca kena naṃ → na tena naṃ (mr); na naṃ (?)
mn129:3.7: saṃvijjanteva te → saṃvijjante te ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn129:22.6: ye vā panaññepi keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā asucismiṃ jāyanti asucismiṃ jīyanti asucismiṃ mīyanti → etthantare pāṭho pts-vp-pli1ed potthake
mn129:24.7: Yadi pana → yadi nūna (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn129:27.4: ca, kena naṃ → na tena naṃ (mr); na naṃ (?)
mn129:35.5: Svāgataṃ te, mahārāja → svāgataṃ mahārāja (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn129:35.8: bhavanti → ahesuṃ (sya-all, km, mr) | anuyantā → anuyuttā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn129:41.2: upayāpetabbaṃ upayāpetuṃ → upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ (bj, sya-all, km); upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ upaṭṭhapetuṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn129:46.3: Ekamekenapi, bhante, ratanena → tena bhante ratanena (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
